content.description: The obvious split in the face nearest to the Rocky Hollow Picnic Area. The Not So Big Easy is found on the left side of the split. The start is found in the crack. Work hands up the inside of the crack and make way to top out. Do not use any holds on the face, feet are ok , do not use holds or feet across the crack.
content.location: Right of trail from Rocky Hollow Picnic Area or follow trail for Tower Parking and walk toward Rocky Hollow Parking Area. Crack directly to the left of L'eggo-My-Eggo. You may have to jump small stream depending on weather.

content.description: The obvious split in the face nearest to the Rocky Hollow Picnic Area. The Big Easy is found on the right side of the split. The start is found in the crack, it is a small nub that accommodates both hands. From there follow the obvious holds up but do not use any holds or feet across the crack.
content.location: Right of trail from Rocky Hollow Picnic Area or follow trail for Tower Parking and walk toward Rocky Hollow Parking Area. Crack directly to the left of L'eggo-My-Eggo. You may have to jump small stream depending on weather.

content.description: Obvious sit start left of the crack. Work your hands into the crack and work your way up until your left foot is on the start. From there work your way out of the crack left and lean across the face. You need to use the dead flake, trust it, it's good. After that work way up to top sloppy top out.
content.location: Right of trail from Rocky Hollow Picnic Area or follow trail for Tower Parking and walk toward Rocky Hollow Parking Area. Crack directly to the left of L'eggo-My-Eggo. You may have to jump small stream depending on weather.

pathTokens: Rocky Hollow Area at Garret Mountain

content.description: The obvious split in the face nearest to the Rocky Hollow Picnic Area. There are two problems there The Big Easy (V0) and The Not So Big Easy (V2).
